articles.title: Pete Hegseth urges Asia to boost defence against China's 'imminent' threat to Taiwan - BBC
articles.description: The US defence secretary called on Asian countries to boost defence spending and work with the US to deter war.
articles.content:
US Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth has warned of China posing an "imminent" threat to Taiwan, while urging Asian countries to boost defence spending and work with the US to deter war.
Hegseth also… [+1895 chars]
